content.en: AI in Marketing: Artificial intelligence (AI) is playing an increasingly important role in marketing. It has the potential to support decision-making in strategic situations, contribute to different types of market knowledge critical for business-to-business (B2B) marketing, and impact all aspects of the marketing mix. AI can also be used to process large-scale and unstructured data, enhance the marketing function across different stages of the marketing planning process, and enable B2B marketing innovation. It is revolutionizing content creation, lead generation, customer experiences, and more in digital marketing. However, there is still a need for further research to explore the full potential of AI in marketing and address the identified gaps and challenges.
content.da: AI i Marketing: Kunstig intelligens (AI) spiller en stadig vigtigere rolle i marketing. Den har potentiale til at understøtte beslutningstagning i strategiske situationer, bidrage til forskellige typer af markedskendskab, som er kritiske for business-to-business (B2B) marketing, og påvirke alle aspekter af marketingmixet. AI kan også bruges til at behandle storskala og ustrukturerede data, forbedre marketingfunktionen på tværs af forskellige stadier af marketingplanlægningsprocessen og muliggøre B2B marketinginnovation. Den revolutionerer indholdsskabelse, leadgenerering, kundeoplevelser og mere inden for digital marketing. Der er dog stadig behov for yderligere forskning for at udforske AI's fulde potentiale i marketing og adressere de identificerede huller og udfordringer.
